text:
Yo Moond. Apni to itni memories hai kya kya hi likhu. Apne room se zayda to shyad mai tere room pe hi raha hounga first year se hi. First year me apan exam dene se phle my **** sun ke jaate the enthu badhane ke lie. Lol yaad hai 1st year summer me apan gye the e-club ka test dene aur hume nhi lia tha aur R****** ko le lia tha. Humne maximum course saath me hi kie hain aur tu mujhe cycle pe bitha ke le jata tha. 2nd year udghosh me mere meme banane ke baad lo*** ne chutiyapa kia tha fir tune id banai thi. Bahut bakchod thi wo id waise. Bhola tujhe vc na karta to aur use hota us id ka. 
Best time apna to 2nd year summer hi raha hai. Pure din bas bulla session chalte rehte the. Ek baar mai tu jai mil ke tujhe shaadi se bhagane ki planning kar rhe the jiska kharcha teri bmw bech ke aata. 3rd year ka winter bhi apna bahut interesting hi raha tha. Pehle quiz ko leke batti gang me dispute hua. Phir tune chapa dia tha jisko sun ke mai full shocked tha. Phir prank ke chakkar me batti gang me phir dispute hua tha. Jisko sort karne ke lie maine bahut lamba msg likha tha jo tu maan nhi rha tha ki maine likha hai. ( Ab to maan lena, wo maine khud se hi likha tha) In sab ko mast new year party ke saath conclude kia tha. 
Uske baad to lockdown me hi beet gya pichla saal. Abhi mai last me aaya hota to maza aata but koi nhi apan to milte hi rahenge. 
PS: Humesha aise hi logic lagate rehna.
author: Abhinav  Ankit

text:
Yo Bhole. E6 me wingi se start kie phir dheere dheere itna close bond develop ho gya. Kitna pubg khele hain hum log. Specially AOB squad. Yaad hai thermo wale ne hum teeno ko class se bhaga dia tha. Lol tab bhi pubg hi discuss kar rhe the class me. 
Us sem mai bolta tha tujhe ki tera A nhi lagega, phir maine khud ne hag dia tha xD.
Jab tune story sunai thi tab mai aur Abhijeet full surprised the. Abhijeet to bahut zayda hi shocked tha. Tab realise hua ki tu bas naam se hi bhola hai.(Wiase aakhein khol di thi humne teri.) Second year me to apna room bagal me tha. Mai to pada rehta tha tumhare room pe. Bahut maze kie hain. 2 trips ka plan banaya tha tere saath but dono me kat gya mai. Koi nhi karenge jab milte hain. 
PS: Paise sambhal ke rakhna apne, bahar bahot log hain lootne wale.
author: Abhinav  Ankit

text:
Yo roomie. Apan to ek dusre ko kota se jaante hain. Tab to kafi kam baat hui thi. Jis din campus aaya tha to list dekha ki roommate kon hai. Phir dekha ki is bande ko to pehle se janta hu mai. Jab start me seniors raat ko darwaza thoke the aur apna kholte nhi the dar se. Pta nhi kyu bc mai, tu aur bhole udghosh me gye. First  year summer me mast pubg khelte the apan aur tu kya bakchod peek karta tha aur wo TA me top view dekhna lol. Mai, tu, das aur bhole pta nhi match saath khele the. Lol AOB squad. 
Kai baar jab mai beemar padta tha to tu mujhe cycle pe bitha ke HC le jata tha. Tujhe itna padhta dekh ke mai bhi padh lia thora. Mai apne room se zayda to dusro ke room me bhatakta rehta tha.
Apni ek bhi trip nhi ho paai kyuki mai kat jata tha. Ab jab milenge tab karte hain ek trip.
author: Abhinav  Ankit
